question: Name an lncRNA associated with dilated cardiomyopathy.
ideal_answer: The lncRNA H19 is significantly upregulated in the myocardial tissue in dilated cardiomyopathy.

snippets.text: In the previous study, we generated a rat model of dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM) induced by adriamycin and found that the expression of lncRNA H19 was significantly upregulated in myocardial tissue.
The long non-coding RNA H19 promotes cardiomyocyte apoptosis in dilated cardiomyopathy.
